title: Pixel 5 poor scrolling on some apps
content:
I first noticed this issue on Microsoft teams and put it down to that particular app. The app works flawlessly apart from when I load an attachment such as a word document then the scrolling of the document just jitters. 

I have now found the same issue on my banking app where the scrolling jitter isn't as bad but it is still noticeable through all parts of the app.
